ExportSentinels.name: Venari Prime
ExportSentinels.description: Khora's will, Venari's fangs and claws.

ExportSentinels.name: Venari
ExportSentinels.description: Khora's loyal Kavat. Her constant companion and protector.

ExportSentinels.name: Wyrm
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Crowd Dispersion' as default Precepts, Wyrm is a highly offensive Sentinel. Wyrm also comes with a laser rifle.

ExportSentinels.name: Taxon
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Molecular Conversion' as default Precepts, Taxon protects its owner with shield restoration. Equipped with the Artax ice-beam.

ExportSentinels.name: Shade
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Revenge' and 'Ghost' as default Precepts, Shade is well suited for stealth gameplay. Shade also comes with a burst laser pistol.

ExportSentinels.name: Oxylus
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Scan Aquatic Lifeforms' and 'Scan Matter' as default Precepts, Oxylus was designed to assist in Search-and-Rescue operations through the harsh landscape around The Orb Vallis. Oxylus also comes with a Multron rifle.

ExportSentinels.name: Prisma Shade
ExportSentinels.description: A rare jewel of the void. How could anything so beautiful be crafted for stealth?

ExportSentinels.name: Wyrm Prime
ExportSentinels.description: Both bodyguard and status symbol, the Wyrm Prime Sentinel was the last line of defense for high ranking Tenno in the Orokin Era.

ExportSentinels.name: Shade Prime
ExportSentinels.description: Shade Prime specializes in stealth and comes locked and loaded with the Burst Laser Prime. Together, you can dominate the shadows.

ExportSentinels.name: Helios Prime
ExportSentinels.description: This knowledge hungry protector defends its master with Deconstructor Prime.

ExportSentinels.name: Dethcube Prime
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube Prime is the apex of lethal support. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle Prime weapon.

ExportSentinels.name: Carrier Prime
ExportSentinels.description: This ornate sentinel is an excellent example of late Orokin craftsmanship and styling.

ExportSentinels.name: Nautilus Prime
ExportSentinels.description: This brave deckhand defends his crew with Verglas Prime.

ExportSentinels.name: Helios
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Investigator' as its unique Precept and 'Deconstructor' as its weapon, the versatile Helios Sentinel acts as both a lethal guardian and an automatic codex scanner. Scans require an equipped Codex Scanner and an available charge.

ExportSentinels.name: Djinn
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Thumper' and 'Fatal Attraction' as default Precepts, Djinn is a combat Sentinel. Djinn also comes with a poison dart weapon.

ExportSentinels.name: Nautilus
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Auto Omni' and 'Cordon' as default Precepts, this Sentinel is the ideal companion for long voyages aboard a Railjack.

ExportSentinels.name: Dethcube
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Vaporize' as default precepts, Dethcube acts exactly as advertised, as a badass cube of 'deth'. Comes loaded with Deth Machine Rifle weapon.

ExportSentinels.name: Carrier
ExportSentinels.description: With 'Assault Mode' and 'Ammo Case' as default Precepts, Carrier is a seeker Sentinel. Carrier also comes with a shotgun weapon.

ExportSentinels.name: Diriga
ExportSentinels.description: Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.

ExportSentinels.name: Chesa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: A clever accomplice, trained to relieve the enemy of both their weapons and their loot caches.

ExportSentinels.name: Sunika Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: Bred by the Orokin for combat. This martial beast lives to create chaos and bring down the most fierce opponents.

ExportSentinels.name: Raksa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: A strong guardian focused on protecting its master by bolstering their defense and by driving away attackers.

ExportSentinels.name: Huras Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: A stealthy ally, surprising enemies with impressive takedowns of explosive force.

ExportSentinels.name: Helminth Charger
ExportSentinels.description: An experimental blending of Kubrow and Infestation. Uses maggots and other Infested abilities to inflict damage and control the battlefield.

ExportSentinels.name: Sahasa Kubrow
ExportSentinels.description: A reliable partner that locates supplies for their Tenno master and while thinning enemy ranks.

ExportSentinels.name: Vasca Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: Now free of the Vasca virus, these Kavats can transfuse life to extend not only health own life but that of its master.

ExportSentinels.name: Adarza Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: A vicious and deadly Kavat prized for its combat prowess, offering increased critical chance and punishing those that dare attack it.

ExportSentinels.name: Smeeta Kavat
ExportSentinels.description: This sly feline is playful yet devious.

ExportSentinels.name: Sly Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.

ExportSentinels.name: Vizier Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Pharaoh Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Medjay Predasite
ExportSentinels.description: These hard-charging, four-legged predators make formidable companions when in the field.

ExportSentinels.name: Crescent Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.

ExportSentinels.name: Panzer Vulpaphyla
ExportSentinels.description: Fast and foxy, Vulpaphyla are agile allies to bring along on your next adventure.
